alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 4:09AM PST until March 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches, except less than an inch below 1000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels are expected to be between 500 and 1000 feet through Saturday morning. This means the most likely outcome for the lower elevations is an inch at most.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
